entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Wet snow mixed with rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud and 60 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Snow level rising to 1100 metres near noon. Fog patches early this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
